title.value: Research on properties of dry mashed potatoes on the basis of blanched and not blanched potato
Исследование свойств сухого картофельного пюре на основе бланшированного и не бланшированного картофеля

subject.value: produit aa base de pomme de terre

person.name: Litvyak, V.V., National Academy of Sciences (Belarus). Scientific and Practical Center for Foodstuffs
Pozdnyakov, V.M., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented the results of studying of dry mashed potatoes (Solanum tuberosum) received by means of different technologies. The aim of the study was to investigate dry mashed potatoes derived from blanched and not blanched potatoes. The process hypothesis blanching is offered. As a result of the phase and morphological analysis it was marked that mashed potatoes, prepared with pre-blanching and without prior blanching is absolute amorphous halo. Based on the rheological properties of mashed potatoes there was proposed a hypothesis of blanching process. The process of blanching is complex and has multiple stages. The process of blanching involves all components of organic material (proteins, carbohydrates, fats, etc.). The essence of the process lays in the particular way the orientation of functional groups biocomposite material of the various components in an aqueous medium. As a result of this orientation there is an interaction between negatively and positively charged functional groups, as well as there is a formation of amorphous secondary formations, which are easily destroyed by the shear load.
